page.title: 05POP MUSIC IN 1985.
page.content: There are a lot of different groups in the 1980's.Some of the more popular groups include{Duran Duran, Wham, Paul {Young, Tears for Fears and Frankie {Goes to Hollywood.}My favourite group is{Duran Duran.}They consist of five men who enjoy making music.The lead singer,{Simon Le Bon,}is related to a local doctor and when he visits his uncle the local fans go wild. Some groups like{Frankie goes to Hollywood write controversial songs such as{'Two {Tribes'}.Their first single{'Relax' was banned by the B.B.C and consequently stayed at number one in the charts for five weeks. The main British charts are compiled by a computerised company called{'Gallup'. They show which records have sold the most copies during a week.The one that has sold the most is number one. There are 40 records in the charts.
